name: proper
description: A tool for managing configuration properties over various environments and versions

scripts.setup:db: docker-machine create proper --driver virtualbox && eval $(docker-machine env proper) && docker run --name proper-mariadb -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=proper-root -p 3306:3306 -d mariadb
scripts.db:session: docker run -it --link proper-mariadb:mysql --rm mariadb sh -c 'exec mysql -h"$MYSQL_PORT_3306_TCP_ADDR" -P"$MYSQL_PORT_3306_TCP_PORT" -uroot -p"$MYSQL_ENV_MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD"'

author: Mathis Kretz
